TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. All personal things die.

I wish I can into space

Granted. Polan, however, still cannot into space.

I wish my pet dog was still alive.

Granted...

I wish that I wasn't so sad now...

Granted. A person you really hate becomes president.

I wish I wasnt bored.

Granted. You get drilled instead.

I wish I had two puppy dogs.

Granted, they are both dead and full of parasites

i wish mars was closer

Granted, Mars slams into the Earth, creating another moon, which crashes into the current moon.

I wish for infinite genies.

Granted, they all hate you, and use DeathWishes to kill you.

I wish that there was a planet 2 years away from us. Two normal NASA mission years way, to be specific. Oh and it would have to be habitable by EARTH creatures only, no aliens allowed.

Granted, it becomes a lair of crime, violence and corruption.

Wish I had a flying machine.

Granted. Your bike shop goes bankrupt, and you watch in horror as Orville and Wilbur buy both it and your flying machine from you.

I wish that both my puppy dogs were still alive and healthy.

Granted. They happen to be a mutant dog which falls under the goverment's hands and you never see your dogs again.

I wish for poland to into space.

Granted. The entire country of Poland is popped into space, with no air.

I wish for world peace.

Granted. Im not saying its aliens. But its aliens.

I wish for my popcorn to pop faster.

Granted, this popcorn is nukapopcorn and explosions kill you and your close familly.

I wish hackers in games didn't exist.

Granted, the technology to block them is owned by EA. $50 for the module $100 for the actual process.

I wish to be a better SSTOer.

Granted. They are better at killing you.

I wish for a new life.

Granted, it's worse than the worst torture known to humankind.

I wish to wish for more SSTO engines.

Granted, you can wish that now but the wish doesn't come true.

I wish I was better at this.

Granted, but then no one cares.

I wish I had a 512-bit version of KSP

Granted, your computer crashes.

I wish for more SSTO engines.

Granted, but they are in a $500 DLC.

I wish I could find money in every parking ticket machine I obsessively check.

granted, but its outdated money

i wish ksp was goty

Granted. I feel like breaking the rules on this one, it's incorruptable.

I wish I had an F-22

http://i723.photobucket.com/albums/ww232/Sebsundquist/calvin_hobbes_trex_jet_zpsup2ijcsx.jpg' alt='calvin_hobbes_trex_jet_zpsup2ijcsx.jpg'>

Enough said

I wish for free wifi wherevere I go.

Granted. It eats your battery instantly.

I wish for Russia to do more stupid things
